events.message: I placed my order two weeks ago, but it still hasn't arrived. The tracking info shows no updates for several days, and I'm really worried about the delay.
The customer reports a shipping delay for their order with no recent tracking updates.
Assigning this case to the shipping support specialist to investigate the delay further.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out to us. I understand your concern about the delayed delivery, and I’m here to help you figure out what’s going on.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address? This will allow me to check the current status of your package.
Sure, my order number is 987654321 and the shipping address is 123 Maple Street, Springfield. I hope this helps you locate my package.

Thank you for the information. I checked with our shipping partner, and it appears the package was delayed due to weather conditions. It should arrive within the next 3 days. I’m also issuing a shipping update notification for you.
Thanks for the update. I understand the delay is due to weather, and I appreciate you keeping me informed and sending the notification.
Glad I could assist! Your order is now tracked for delivery within three days. Please reach out if you face any further issues.
Just following up to ensure your order arrived safely and everything is satisfactory with your delivery experience.
Since the delivery was completed, we are closing this case. Thank you for your patience and for contacting support.
